com.robopupu.api.util

Class PermissionRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.util.PermissionRequest

  • public class PermissionRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    PermissionRequest is an object that can be used for requesting a permission at run time.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PermissionRequest.Callback

    • Constructor Detail

      • PermissionRequest

        public PermissionRequest(android.app.Activity activity,
                         java.lang.String permission,
                         PermissionRequest.Callback callback)
        Constructs a new instance PermissionRequest for requesting the specified user permission.
        Parameters:
        activity - An Activity needed for ActivityCompat#requestPermissions(Activity, String[], int). May not be null.
        permission - A String specifying the requested permission. May not be null.
        callback - A PermissionRequest.Callback provided by the permission requester. May not be null.

    • Method Detail

      • getPermission

        public java.lang.String getPermission()
        Return the requested permission.
        Returns:
        A String specifying the permission.

      • getRequestId

        public int getRequestId()
        Return the request ID assigned for this PermissionRequest.
        Returns:
        The request ID as an int value.

      • commit

        public void commit()
        Commits this PermissionRequest. First it check if the requested user permission has been already granted. If not then, it is checked if the user should be presented with a rationale for granting the requested permission. If it is not necessary to show the rationale, the permission is actually requested by invoking ActivityCompat#requestPermissions(Activity, String[], int).

      • recommit

        public void recommit()
        Recommit this PermissionRequest after the user has shown the rationale for granting the permission.

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        protected void onRequestPermissionsResult(boolean granted)
        Invoked by PermissionRequestManager when the permission has been granted or denied.
        Parameters:
        granted - A boolean value.

      • isPermissionGranted

        public static boolean isPermissionGranted(android.content.Context context,
                                          java.lang.String permission)
        Test if the specific user permission has been already granted.
        Parameters:
        context - A Context.
        permission - A String specifying the requested permission. May not be null.
        Returns:
        A boolean value.
